parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword in an SQL statement, which is used to filter queries. Set the value to **SELECT**.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which queries are sorted based on the specified fields. Specify this parameter as an ordered JSON array in the `[{"Field":"Time","Type":"Desc" },{ "Field":"User", "Type":"Asc" }]` format.

*   **Field** specifies the field used to sort queries. Valid values: Time, User, Host, and DB.
*   **Type** specifies the sorting sequence. Valid values: **Desc** and **Asc**.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 30. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

parameters.name: RunningTime
parameters.description: The execution duration used to filter queries. Queries that take a longer time than the specified execution duration are displayed. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ShowFull
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to show a complete SQL statement. Valid values:

*   **True**: shows a complete SQL statement.
*   **False**: shows only the first 100 characters of an SQL statement.

>  The default value is False.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the user used to filter queries.
